description: Try our easy to follow English Spinach & Cheese Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: English Spinach & Cheese Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 bunch english spinach, leaves removed and washed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over a medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until soft. Roughly shred spinach and add to onion. Cook for 2 minutes or until just wilted. Remove from heat and cool. Fold through dill, feta, cheddar cheese, nutmeg and eggs. Season with salt and pepper.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Lightly brush a 26x16cm (base) x3cm deep slab tin with melted butter. Place a sheet of filo onto a flat surface, brush with butter and top with another sheet of filo. Repeat 4 more times.

Line prepared tin with pastry. Spoon spinach mix into pastry base. Prepare remaining 4 sheets of pastry as before. Lay over spinach filling, trim edges and brush top of pie with remaining butter. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Cut into squares and serve with salad.
